page.title: 03WHY I LIKE THWAITES SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is called Thwaites Primary School. It has three teachers and in the whole school there are 50 children from 4 to 11 years old. I am a top infant and in our class there are 16.I like doing Sound Sense at school because of the word games and I like writing stories because I can put magic things in them.I'm not very good at poems yet because I haven't had as much practise. I think our school is a nice school because there aren't so many rules and because it's in the country.The children here don't do much fighting! At playtime I like going to play on the climbing frame and in the trees. My best tree is "The Nest".It is a tree in the churchyard and it has a nest shape at the top. I enjoy finding new ways up the tree.
